item.title: 中国股票基金发行量下降，固定收益重获青睐
item.description: 12 月份，随着秋季股市涨势乏力，债券的吸引力再次上升，中国投资者对股票型共同基金的偏好有所减弱。【原文：Chinese investors’ appetite for stock-focused mutual funds waned in December as the autumn equity rally sputtered and bonds once again gained attraction.】

item.title: 马科斯签署菲律宾 2025 年预算，否决部分拨款
item.description: 菲律宾总统小费迪南德-马科斯在否决了部分公共工程和备用资金后，于周一签署了菲律宾 2025 年 6.3 万亿比索（约合 1,090 亿美元）的预算。【原文：President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. on Monday signed the Philippines’ 6.3 trillion peso ($109 billion) budget for 2025 after vetoing some public works and standby funding.】

item.title: 卢比疲软令印度股票难卖
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 印度股市持续低迷，投资者将过度关注盈利情况
item.description: 尽管面临经济挑战，印度股市仍希望延续史无前例的年度连涨势头，投资者将聚焦盈利增长，选出新的赢家。【原文：Investors will zero in on earnings growth to pick out new winners, as Indian stocks aim to extend an unprecedented annual streak despite economic challenges.】

item.title: 新加坡邮政在举报人举报后任命集团财务总监
item.description: 新加坡邮政有限公司（Singapore Post Ltd.）任命了一名集团首席财务官，并表示将继续物色首席执行官人选，此前该公司因被指控行为不当而解雇了多名高级管理人员。【原文：Singapore Post Ltd. named a group chief financial officer and said the search for a chief executive continues after it fired a number of senior executives over allegations of misconduct.】

item.title: 中国 2024 年第一大股票有望从人工智能自力更生中获益
item.description: 中国 2024 年的绩优股有望在明年迎来更多顺风，因为中国正努力提高人工智能的自给自足能力。【原文：China’s top-performing stock of 2024 is expected to see additional tailwinds into next year from the nation’s drive for greater self-sufficiency in artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 韩国空难造成 179 人死亡，鸟击事件成谜
item.description: 调查人员在调查韩国有史以来最严重的民航事故的原因时，将重点关注鸟击事件和波音公司 737 喷气式客机在最后时刻出现的异常着陆装置故障，这起事故造成波音公司 737 喷气式客机的 181 名乘客中除两人外全部遇难。【原文：Investigators probing the cause of the worst civil aviation accident ever in South Korea will focus on a bird strike and the unusual landing-gear failure in the final moments of the fateful flight that left all but two of the 181 occupants of the Boeing Co. 737 jet dead.】

item.title: 特朗普推动的比特币反弹在年末失去动力
item.description: 随着2024年的临近，11月初美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普赢得大选引发的比特币涨势正在停滞。【原文：The Bitcoin rally sparked by US President-elect Donald Trump’s election victory in early November is stalling as 2024 draws to a close.】

item.title: 石油在清淡交易中下跌，交易商关注 2025 年前景
item.description: 由于市场在关注中东事态发展的同时，也在关注 2025 年的前景，石油在平静的年末交易中下滑。【原文：Oil slipped in quiet end-of-year trading, as the market focused on the outlook for 2025 while monitoring Middle East developments.】

item.title: 澳门债券上市量激增，转向博彩业
item.description: 澳门正在举办创纪录数量的债券上市活动，因为这个世界顶级赌博中心正努力推动经济多元化，并将自己打造成中国企业的另类融资中心。【原文：Macau is hosting a record amount of bond listings as the world’s top gambling hub boosts efforts to diversify its economy and establish itself as an alternative financing hub for Chinese firms.】

item.title: 英伟达供应商 Ibiden 考虑加快扩张以满足人工智能需求
item.description: Ibiden 公司是 Nvidia 公司尖端半导体所用芯片封装基板的主要供应商，该公司首席执行官表示，该公司可能需要加快提高产能的步伐，以满足需求。【原文：Ibiden Co., the dominant supplier of chip package substrates used in Nvidia Corp.’s cutting-edge semiconductors, may need to dial up the pace of production capacity increases to keep up with demand, according to its chief executive officer.】

item.title: 美国股市下跌后，亚洲股市有望弱势开盘：市场综述
item.description: 周五美国股市下跌，科技股领跌，亚洲股市开盘后将表现疲软。【原文：Asian stocks are set for a weak opening after US equities dropped on Friday, led by losses in technology shares.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克敦促欧盟采取行动阻止俄罗斯天然气过境
item.description: 斯洛伐克总理罗伯特-菲佐（Robert Fico）敦促欧盟委员会解决俄罗斯即将停止通过乌克兰输送天然气的问题，并称这对欧盟的经济影响将远远超过对俄罗斯的影响。【原文：Slovak Prime Minister Robert Fico urged the European Commission to address the looming halt of Russian gas transit through Ukraine, saying the economic impact on the European Union will far outweigh the effect on Russia.】

item.title: 进入 2024 年最后一周，债券投资者面临亏损风险
item.description: 债券投资者即将进入又一个假期缩短的交易周，几乎没有经济数据发布，也没有美联储发言人的讲话安排。【原文：Bond investors are heading into another holiday-shortened trading week with few economic data releases or scheduled Federal Reserve speakers.】

item.title: 彩票 12.6 亿美元得主将需要税务律师和治疗师
item.description: 对于加利福尼亚州售出的一张 12.6 亿美元巨奖彩票的中奖者来说，中大奖的喜悦可能很快就会让位于对一些重大选择的焦虑。【原文：For the winner of a $1.26 billion Mega Millions jackpot ticket sold in California, the ecstasy of the big win may soon give way to the anxiety over some big choices.】

item.title: 尽管美联储和大选闹得沸沸扬扬，2024 年美国经济仍将再次令人惊喜
item.description: 在过去的几年里，美国经济一直未能打破经济放缓的预期，2024 年也不例外。【原文：Over the last few years, the US economy has consistently defied expectations for a slowdown, and 2024 was no different.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数 2024 年的反弹令预测者大跌眼镜，因为他们预计这波反弹会昙花一现
item.description: 去年这个时候，股市的涨势甚至已经超过了最乐观的目标，华尔街的预测者们确信股市无法保持这种令人目眩的速度。【原文：By this time last year, the stock market’s rally had blown past even the most optimistic targets and Wall Street forecasters were convinced it couldn’t keep up the dizzying pace.】

item.title: 戏剧化的金融科技公司 2025 年将面临混杂的监管环境
item.description: 提供提前领取工资或 "先买后付 "计划等服务的新兴金融公司吸引了越来越多客户和投资者的关注。根据 CB Insights 的数据，2024 年前三个季度，金融科技公司在全球范围内筹集了近 240 亿美元的资金，对传统银行和资产管理公司构成了越来越大的竞争威胁。【原文：Upstart financial firms that provide services like early paycheck access or buy-now, pay-later plans have attracted rising interest from customers and investors alike. Fintechs raised nearly $24 billion globally in the first three quarters of 2024, according to data from CB Insights, and represent a growing competitive threat to traditional banks and asset managers.】

item.title: 警告：新兴市场一周前瞻将于 1 月 5 日重启
item.description: 新兴市场一周前瞻专栏和 "新兴市场发生了什么 "播客将于 12 月 29 日星期日停止发布。这两个栏目将于 1 月 5 日星期日恢复。【原文：The Emerging Markets Week Ahead column and the “What’s Happening in EM” podcast won’t be published on Sunday, Dec. 29. Both will resume on Sunday, Jan. 5.】

item.title: 韩国数十年来最严重空难：济州空难造成 120 多人死亡
item.description: 济州航空公司运营的一架波音 737-800 飞机在韩国机场跑道上坠毁并起火，造成 170 多人死亡或失踪。【原文：A Boeing Co. 737-800 aircraft operated by Jeju Air Co. crashed and caught fire on an airport runway in South Korea, resulting in more than 170 people dead or missing.】

item.title: 飞机在韩国机场坠毁，造成至少 23 人死亡：韩联社
item.description: 据韩联社周日报道，一架济州航空公司的飞机在韩国机场降落时偏离跑道，与一堵墙相撞，造成至少 23 人死亡。【原文：A Jeju Air plane landing at an airport in South Korea veered off the runway and collided with a wall, killing at least 23 people, Yonhap news agency reported on Sunday.】

item.title: 中国股利支付创历史新高加剧人民币压力
item.description: 中国雄心勃勃地重振疲软的股市，却意外地让人民币成为牺牲品，创纪录的股息派发导致资金外流。【原文：China’s ambitious campaign to revive its flagging stock market has made the yuan an unintended casualty, with record dividend payouts leading to outflows.】

item.title: Atos 称勒索软件组织声称其破坏了一个数据库
item.description: Atos SE称，一个名为Space Bears的勒索软件组织周六声称已经入侵了Atos的一个数据库。【原文：Atos SE said a ransomware group called Space Bears claimed on Saturday to have compromised an Atos database.】

item.title: N.朝鲜对美国采取 "最强应对战略"：韩联社
item.description: 韩国联合通讯社援引朝鲜国营新闻机构朝中社的报道称，朝鲜执政党对美国采取了 "最强硬的应对策略"。【原文：North Korea’s ruling party adopted “the strongest response strategy” toward the US, South Korean news agency Yonhap reported, citing North Korea’s state-run KCNA.】

item.title: AT&T 称 "盐台风 "黑客攻击后网络已恢复正常
item.description: AT&T 公司承认受到了与中国有关的 "Salt Typhoon "黑客行动的攻击，但其网络现已摆脱入侵。【原文：AT&T Inc. acknowledged that it had been hit by the China-linked Salt Typhoon hacking operation but that its networks were now clear from the intrusion.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克加倍支持德国极右翼政党 AfD
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克在《世界报》（Welt am Sonntag）发表的一篇评论文章中重申了他对极右翼德国选择党（AfD）的支持。【原文：Elon Musk reiterated his support for the far-right Alternative for Germany party, or AfD, in an opinion piece published by the Welt am Sonntag newspaper less than two months before Germans go to the polls.】

item.title: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司将因债务问题停止对摩尔多瓦的天然气供应
item.description: 俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）因涉嫌违反合同义务，将从莫斯科时间 1 月 1 日上午 8 点起停止向摩尔多瓦供应天然气。【原文：Russian Gazprom PJSC will stop supplies of natural gas to Moldova from 8am Moscow time on January 1 over alleged violation of contract obligations.】

item.title: 塞内加尔总统松科绕过议会通过 2025 年预算案
item.description: 塞内加尔总理奥斯曼-松科（Ousmane Sonko）绕过议会对 6.4 万亿非洲法郎（约合 102 亿美元）一揽子预算的表决，挥手通过了明年的预算。【原文：Senegal’s Prime Minister Ousmane Sonko waved through next year’s budget, bypassing a parliamentary vote on the 6.4 trillion CFA-franc ($10.2 billion) package.】

item.title: 银行希望分享 Tether 稳定币的数十亿美元利润
item.description: 直到最近，当稳定币市场的领头羊 Tether Holdings 以数十亿美元的利润为傲时，银行们还在一旁羡慕地看着。现在，他们想加入了。【原文：Until recently, banks watched from the sidelines with envy as stablecoin market leader Tether Holdings boasted of billions in profits. Now they want in.】

item.title: 据 Digi 报道，罗马尼亚将于 3 月 23 日重新举行总统选举
item.description: 据 Digi 24 援引不愿透露姓名的知情人士的话报道，罗马尼亚执政联盟同意按计划于 3 月 23 日重新举行总统选举，并于 4 月 6 日举行第二轮选举。【原文：Romania’s ruling coalition agreed to hold a planned rerun of the presidential elections on March 23 and a second round on April 6, Digi 24 reported, citing unidentified people with knowledge of the decision.】
